titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS CONCLUDED - Description

div.p: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS CONCLUDED is the number of referrals for NHS Continuing Healthcare that were concluded in the REPORTING PERIOD.

A referral is concluded when there has been a verified decision on NHS Continuing Healthcare eligibility or the referral has been discounted: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS (DISCOUNTED BEFORE ASSESSMENT).
